snippet.title: Touhou トライフォーカサー Tri-Focuser ~ Outside The Traditional World - All scenes Clear + [ Download link ]
snippet.description:
Hello !
Today, I post a looooong video with all scenes cleared of OtTW.
Outside the traditional world is a "Double Spoiler" type fangame made by the same guys who made TLC, MPP, RSS, WNSP, and BoSM with all characters from their previous game with...at the top... a new character as a final boss of course.

Ido doesn't have anything to prove anymore. His games are top tier quality and each new one is a nice surprise.
About patterns, themes, background design etc..

You can play as Aya, Hatate and Tobiko. They all have their own advantages and backdraws.
Hatate recharges her camera faster but her reach is quite weak.
Tobiko camera zone is big but it also points at Tobiko's direction
Aya Camera's zone is smaller but she can take photos very far.

Also, longest video I've upload ever ~

---------------------------------------------------------
 Creator : Ido

Download link : http://th-jss.cocolog-nifty.com/blog/2017/06/2017-c814.html
---------------------------------------------------------------------- 
My scores and achievements : http://borderoflunacy.blogspot.fr/ 

Another way to be informed when I post a video or I have something to say : https://twitter.com/Pruns1 --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 See you next time ~
